name: Ultra Laser Defense
description:
How long can you defend your land from the invading army of doom? Hold left click to aim and fire your extremely powerful laser! Leave in the comments below what your highest score was!

Coding & SFX: ShawnTheSheep

Art

Paratrooper & jet: RebelliousRobot

Background: ESF1

Laser gun: Laphicet

Music

Movement Proposition by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4088-movement-proposition
